conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Hi 👋 is this seat available?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Yes it is available.

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Thanks ☺️

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: No need to mention 🙂

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: It’s very difficult to get a seat especially in the festival season.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Yeah, you may not get it if you pick the bus from the next stop. 😄

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Is it?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: You will come to know once next stop is arrived 😃

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Yes it is about to come

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Yes

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Oh my god, look at the crowd. are those taking the same bus?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Yes they will 😅

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Where are they going to stand up? 😧

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Looks like you never saw a crowd like this before. 🤭🤭

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Obviously i have seen this type of crowd before. But just curious how can they manage. 🫤

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Don’t worry they will leave the bus in the next stop

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Ohh, it looks like you are travelling everyday through this bus?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Yes I am. I am doing a job in nearest city

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Nice… me too but i am not used to travel in buses

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: That’s why these are very surprising for you

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: By the way, My self Nimesh and working in J&D Infosys company.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Really? 😯 since how long you are doing job in this company?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Hmmm. Since the company is founded. 😃

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: I never saw you before. I have been in the same company since last 5 years. 😲

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Yes usually i never came out from my cabin and I work till late so I might not be interacting to other people 😊

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: My self Sneha. I am Sr. Software Engineer

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Wow in which technology?

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: .Net 😁
